title: [Neuroscience] A potent and selective nociceptin receptor antagonist, BTRX-246040, shows anti depressant effect in rodent models, further challenging the idea of the monoamine hypothesis of depression. It is currently in Phase II for MDD.

[Neuroscience] Researchers found that the brain couples lower frequencies of oscillations of neural activity with higher ones to allows fine-tuning the brain and is thus the basis for higher cognitive functions, such as selective attention
